sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that there is no competing interest.

sec.title: Author’s information
sec.p: M’mboroki is a PhD research student at institute of climate change and adaptation (ICCA) of University of Nairobi and county project team leader of Regional Pastoral Livelihood Resilience Project—Kenya for Laikipia County while Wandiga is a professor in the institute of climate change and adaptation (director of the ICCA) of University of Nairobi and Oriaso is a senior lecturer in the institute of climate change and adaptation (ICCA) of University of Nairobi.
